casebody.data:
Rick POGUE, Appellant,
v.
CITY OF LEADINGTON, Respondent. No. ED 105829 Missouri Court of Appeals, Eastern District, DIVISION FIVE. Filed: April 17, 2018 Jerome J. Dobson, Meredith S. Berwick, 5017 Washington Place, Third Floor, St. Louis, MO 63108, for appellant. Mark T. Bishop, P.O. Box 740, Hillsboro, MO 63050, for respondent. Before James M. Dowd, C.J., Lawrence E. Mooney, J., and Anthony Rex Gabbert, Sp. J.

ORDER

PER CURIAM

Rick Pogue appeals summary judgment granted in favor of the City of Leadington. An opinion would have no precedential value. The parties have been provided with a memorandum, for their information only, setting forth the reasons for this decision. We affirm the trial court's judgment. Rule 84.16(b)(5).
